text:
good morning (or afternoon or evening or good night) folks!

I'm trying to set up the cname for my domain. According to the <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/domains-and-urls/connect-a-domain-to-HubSpot#4-hosting-setup|docs>, it'll be `[your Hub ID].<http://groupX.sites.HubSpot.net|groupX.sites.HubSpot.net>`.

I know my `Hub ID` , but not what my group `x` would be.

I asked support, but they said it's just sales who were available, and to come here.

As always, it's the DNS. :slightly_smiling_face:
anybody who knows how to determine what "group" I'm in would receive my great appreciation
You can see it in the last step of the HubSpot domain setup wizzard. In the required data field.
I can't seem to access the setup wizard, is there any other way of determining which it is?
my domain and site are up, but I can't seem to change the cname, so I can't attach my www (that is, I can't move it away from google sites)
So you already did the setup for your domain in HubSpot?
Yeah
Then you can show your CNAME if you click on the edit button and then show DNS records.
it only shows me the A records, not the CNAME when I do that
hmmm
hello All

i run hubapi and it's show below error.
Access to XMLHttpRequest at '<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts><https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts'|'>; from origin '<https://5xwebsite.webflow.io>' has been blocked by CORS policy: Response to preflight request doesn't pass access control check: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource.
Can you please help me
Are you trying to use HubSpot api directly from the frontend?
no
I'm using in webflow using ajax
Its because its a primary domain
that sounds like you're calling that api in the frontend, or have you created some sort of server route that handles that api call in the server?
no
on webflow after form submit i have to call this api
so i used jquery call
then it's normal, you can't call authenticated apis from the frontend, you'll expose the access token to the browser, what's the use case here? maybe there's a different route you can take
how we can do?
What is the use case here? what is the end goal?
after form submit i used ajax call
1 form is create in webflow after that form submit i have to call this api
So for my understanding: You try to connect your primary domain to HubSpot?
can't you just use HubSpot forms api (not authenticated api) or more simply create the form in HubSpot and paste the embed code in webflow?
ok direct form right?
I see, thank you so much for your response :)

Yeah, but to set up the www. redirect, the DNS function is a CNAME not an A record, but I need to instruct my registrar (Australian company NetRegistry) what the host of the CNAME is, which is the details above
And you did follow the Connect a domain setup?
Yes, I did
Can you try to disconnect te domain and follow the setup again. This time fill in www at subdomain at the Specify where your content will be hosted section

I need to show a hidden field on a HubSpot form based on inputs of another form field. I cannot use HubSpots inbuilt dependency field logic. How do I customise the embed code to show field if let's say the email field contains example1 or example 2
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>
I figured it out. I just needed to set it up as a redirect, and it autogenerated the grouping and the CNAME record details required.

Quick poll for this remarkable mindshare! Are you using `AI` within your development pipeline today? If so, where do you find it the most impactful/valuable? React with an emoji

> Unit | integration test generation :test_tube:
> Generating code functions :cd:
> Generating test data :chart_with_upwards_trend:
> Writing PR descriptions :git:
> Searching documentation :mag:
> Explore APIs :robot_face:
> CLI commands :computer:
> Documenting code/API :technologist:
> I don't use AI :x:
:wave:Hi! Can You recommend an experienced HubSpot dev, who could help me refresh my website? I would be grateful for any recommendations.
Hi <@U05R96VFS4C>! We have in-house HubSpot devs that may be a good fit. Could you tell me more? :blush:

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
Hi <@U05R96VFS4C>! Please post this in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs>

Hey everyone!  :orange_heart:
(and remote "hello" to people fortunately in Inbound right now!)

We're almost ready to release our HubSpot custom code generator

*WE NEED YOUR HELP!*

can you please provide as many workflow Custom Code Actions as you know of

*(ideally ones that work!)*

along with good ideas of custom code that you would like to see
we need a wide variety of working examples to test all edge cases

Does anyone know if it's possible to embed a plain text property that contains an image url into a HubSpot Marketing Email using <img src="{image_url_property}"> so that the image displays in the email? I've tried it, but the html just disappears as soon as I close the editor.

Hey yall, I am new to cookie tracking with HubSpot, but the docs seem pretty clear.  Unfortunately, I notice that custom behavior events data doesn't display in the dashboard on the same day. So I don't know how to test whether the events are being properly logged without waiting 24 hours.  Is there a way for me to do that?

I am using a react application.  The tracking code on my site is working and tracking page views when sent through email marketing.  I am just trying to add a click event to my tracking.  I added a custom event in the dashboard and onClick, I added this code:

`const sendHubSpotClickEvent = city => {`
    `const _hsq = (window._hsq = window._hsq || []);`
    `_hsq.push([`
      `"trackCustomBehaviorEvent",`
      `{`
        `name: "INTERNAL_EVENT_NAME"`
      `}`
    `]);`
  `};`
Did I miss anything ^^?
Also, if I am sending people to the site via a marketing email, will that event above automatically tie them to the HubSpot utk or do I need to pull it and send it along?

Has anyone noticed that HubSpot seems to keep Email bodies in their integrated mail system? Whenever I create a new quote and open I click "write email with quote" it takes the body of a previously unfinished mail? Is there a bug tracker somewhere where I can post this?
Disregard. I figured it out. This slack is dead.

Hello Everyone, when I share two of the URLs on twitter, thumbnail preview shows different in sizes. I've used the same image on both the URLs for testing purpose. can anyone help me on this?
<https://kissflow.com/success-stories/united-motors-group-case-study> ----> Small thumbnail
<https://kissflow.com/> ----> Big thumbnail

I am looking to create a contact-based workflow to copy and append values from one property to another.

kindly help me.
